summary: The Nintendo 3DS is a popular handheld gaming console with a unique 3D display. It was released in 2011 as the follow-up to the Nintendo DS. The 3DS can play older DS games and offers features like StreetPass for connecting with other players. It has different models, like the larger 3DS XL and the more affordable 2DS. Nintendo also released an upgraded version, the New Nintendo 3DS, with a better processor and an extra control stick. The 3DS was a big success, selling millions of units worldwide before being discontinued in 2020.
title: Nintendo 3DS
